column2: Gah! Chocobo feathers, you scared me! Um, you’re not with the Bahamutian Army, are you?
You see, the Bahamutian soldiers are all Jiants like you.
Wh-wh-where in the world did those weird Mirages come from?!
They’ve announced that the Bahamutian Army’s been defeated. We can finally live our lives in peace!
